title: LifeFood Organic
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Receive 10%OFF discount when you mention "HappyCow" on your first purchase. This is LifeFood's 2nd LA location, opened June 2014. An organic cafe and take-out counter offering fresh juices, smoothies, prepared raw foods, raw desserts, and a retail selection of raw foods and health products. Most items are vegan and raw except a couple with dairy and bee products. Has Wi-Fi.
